CTASection.content: Hola, soy Raúl. Me gusta crear páginas web con tla tla fek s

paragraph.text: Empecé a estudiar desarrollo web en 2019 de manera autodidacta con la ayuda de The Odin Project
Learning how to work with Git through GitHub, then HTML and CSS, then in early 2020...

paragraph.subtitle: A formal education
paragraph.text: I enrolled in Acámica’s Full Stack Web Development program in Buenos Aires, Argentina
Where I improved my HTML and CSS skills and learned JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, and working with databases such as MySQL and MongoDB

paragraph.subtitle: Aftermath
paragraph.text: After I completed the Acámica program in September 2020, I added features and made improvements to some of the projects I’d started and started learning React.js on my own
Currently I find myself looking for my first experience in the industry to work alongside a team and therefore be able to learn even more from them

projects.name: Sitio web personal
projects.summary: The website you're currently seeing! Hope you like it, it's my first React.js AND TailwindCSS proper project

projects.name: GifOS
projects.summary: Web app that allows the user to make their own GIFs, search for their favourite ones and get recommendations. The app uses the Giphy APIF

footerSection.content: Hecho con React.js, TailwindCSS y bastante ❤
